title: Kenya deports fiery opposition lawyer
text:
Kenya deports fiery opposition lawyer 1:18am IST - 01:31 
A Kenyan opposition politician says he was assaulted and drugged then forcibly deported to Dubai. He'd been arrested two days earlier when he tried to return from an earlier deportation. It escalates a stand-off between Kenya's courts - who ruled the deportations illegal - and government.   
A Kenyan opposition politician says he was assaulted and drugged then forcibly deported to Dubai. He'd been arrested two days earlier when he tried to return from an earlier deportation. It escalates a stand-off between Kenya's courts - who ruled the deportations illegal - and government.  //reut.rs/2pRK8CB
